EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Ovum_Zipkin_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Zipkin! To learn more about or get involved with the project visit the OpenZipkin <[[http://zipkin.io/]]> page and the GitHub <[[https://github.com/openzipkin]]> page or check out how Spring Cloud Sleuth <[[https://cloud.spring.io/spring-cloud-sleuth/]]> is integrating technologies like Zipkin to simplify data capture and logging.
If you are interested in this and related topics, please consider attending SpringOne Platform Conference <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]> in Las Vegas from August 1 to 4, 2016. Content will include technical sessions, customer presentations, and general awesomeness on a variety of topics including continuous integration and delivery, distributed tracing, reactive programming, and microservices. Spend time with technologists and developers from some of the world's most innovative and well-known companies like Netflix, PayPal, The Home Depot, NBC Universal, and Google. Check out the session catalog here <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/schedule/sessions]]>.
Best, The Pivotal Team
